Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Bay City in 1979...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1983, winning 2 games with a 1.59 ERA...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 9/28/1987, off Warren Venne (HAL)...
Injured on 5/29/1988 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
